attributes.action: formally recognise chicken to be kept as a pet.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
What is a pet?

A creature kept as an object of affection

Animals commonly kept as pets include: dog, cat, bird, snake, iguana, salamander, pony, horse, goldfish, guppies, angel fish, rabbit, guinea pig, hamster, gerbil, lamb, mouse, white rat, chicken, pigeon, canary, parakeet, parrot; 
Source: yourdictionary

chicken
• noun 1 a domestic fowl kept for its eggs or meat, especially a young one.
Source: Oxford Dictionary

Please sign to request that local council/housing associations formally recognise Chicken as a pet.

We were able to keep them as pet's during the World War's, why not today?

Thank you for your support.
